item.title: Runecrafting help
item.dc:creator: @kyled123 kyled123
item.description:
@kyled123 wrote:

how do i make it so you get more runes from rcing… you go to abyss and client the air alter… i bring 27 ess and get 52 runes how can i make it so u get more?

incase you need it, heres my air rcing thing…

    if (objectID == 7139) { // air
        if (p.playerHasItem(1436)) {
            if (p.actionTimer == 0) {
                if (p.GoodDistance(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 1) == true) {
                    if (p.playerLevel[20] >= 0) {
                        p.actionTimer = 6;
                        p.setAnimation(791);
                        p.EssReplace(1436, 556);
                        p.addSkillXP((2250 * p.playerLevel[20]), 20);
                    }
                }
            }
        } else if (p.playerLevel[20] <= 0) {
            p.sendMessage("You need a 0 runecrafting to craft these!");
        } else if (!p.playerHasItem(1436)) {
            p.sendMessage("You need some rune essence to craft runes!");
        }
    }

Read full topic
